hero.title: Transform your vision into reality with our creative design, web development and custom graphic solutions.

hero.description: At AstraForge, we transform your visions into captivating digital realities. Our creative and personalized approach guarantees a unique result that makes your brand shine and engages your audience.

services.description: Creative solutions tailored to your needs

infographie.description: Logos, flyers, business cards, brochures... We bring your visual identity to life with unique and impactful designs that perfectly reflect your brand values.

about.subtitle: Who are we?
about.description: AstraForge is a passionate creative agency, dedicated to excellence and innovation in custom web design and development.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: With over 10 years of experience in digital creation and web development, we master the latest technologies to offer you innovative and high-performance solutions.

speed.title: Responsiveness
speed.description: Deadlines respected and transparent communication throughout the project. We keep you informed at every step to ensure a smooth and pleasant collaboration.

support.title: Support
support.description: Personalized assistance before, during, and after the completion of your project. We remain at your disposal to help you evolve your online presence.

price.title: Fair pricing
price.description: Transparent prices adapted to your budget. We offer tailor-made solutions that provide the best value for money to maximize your return on investment.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly explore new technologies and creative approaches to keep your digital presence ahead of the competition.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in working closely with our clients, ensuring your vision is at the heart of every decision we make.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We never compromise on quality, delivering pixel-perfect designs and clean, efficient code for every project.

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.description: Discover testimonials from our satisfied clients
testimonials.quote1: AstraForge completely transformed our online presence. Our new website is not only beautiful, but it has also increased our conversion rate by 40%. Their team is professional, responsive and truly attentive to our needs.
testimonials.quote2: Working with AstraForge has been an exceptional experience. Their creativity and technical expertise brought our vision to life in a way we never imagined. I highly recommend them to any business looking to stand out online.

mission.title: My Mission

vision.title: My Vision
vision.description: I believe that web design and development should be accessible, inclusive, and user-centered. Every project is an opportunity to create something meaningful that resonates with your audience.

pricing.title: Pricing and Services
pricing.note: * These prices are indicative and may vary depending on the complexity and specifics of your project. Contact us for a personalized quote.
pricing.motionDesignDesc: Animations, transitions, visual effects for your videos and interfaces. After Effects, Cinema 4D expertise.
pricing.frontendDevDesc: Integration and development of websites and web applications with React, Vue.js, and other modern frameworks.
pricing.photographyDesc: Professional photo sessions for your products, portraits, events or premises.
pricing.graphicDesignDesc: Creation of logos, graphic charters, printed materials and visuals for your communications.
pricing.uiDesignDesc: Design of intuitive and aesthetic user interfaces for websites and applications.
pricing.pageDescription: Discover our rates for all your digital creation projects. Solutions tailored to your needs and budget.
pricing.motionDesignSkill1: Animations for web and mobile interfaces
pricing.websiteDesc: Professional showcase website to present your company, services and team with a custom design.
pricing.ecommerceDesc: Complete online store with product management, shopping carts, secure payments and order tracking.
pricing.webAppDesc: Custom web application to meet your specific needs, with database and advanced features.
pricing.mobileAppDesc: Native or hybrid mobile application for iOS and Android, with data synchronization and push notifications.
pricing.faqQuestion1: How does a project with AstraForge work?
pricing.faqAnswer1: We start with a free consultation to understand your needs. Then we establish detailed specifications and a quote. After validation, we move on to design, development, and testing before final delivery. Post-delivery follow-up is provided to ensure your satisfaction.
pricing.faqQuestion2: What are the timeframes for a project?
pricing.faqAnswer2: Timeframes vary depending on the complexity of the project: count 2-4 weeks for a showcase website, 4-8 weeks for an e-commerce, and 8-16 weeks for a web or mobile application. We can also offer accelerated solutions for urgent projects.
pricing.faqAnswer3: Our hourly rates are based on the expertise required, technical complexity, and time needed to complete each task. We prioritize transparency and always provide you with a detailed estimate before starting work.
pricing.faqQuestion4: Do you offer maintenance services after delivery?
pricing.faqAnswer4: Yes, we offer different maintenance plans to ensure the proper functioning of your website or application. These plans include security updates, regular backups, bug fixes, and technical support.
pricing.ctaDescription: Contact us today to discuss your needs and get a personalized quote.
